channel.title: Few questions about a client
channel.description: ok so first of all, how do i make it show coords? i want the coords to be displayed on the weight carried or energy or both, tbh im not sure if this is client sided or server. it may be server O.o. i just started coding again and ive never known anything about clients and im still a noob lol, also how do i make it so my client shows and hides the ip part? atm its hiding it but u can still type in an ip. how do i make it show again?

item.title: Few questions about a client
item.dc:creator: @Bangali_boy Bangali boy
item.description:
@Bangali_boy wrote:

Your talking about client-sided.

So…You need to find the players around you in client.java on client file.
Then replace it with xcords & y coords, dosen’t really work much.

Read full topic

item.title: Few questions about a client
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Coords: Server sided.
Command: ::mypos.
Command not added?

        } else if (command.startsWith("mypos")) {
            sendMessage("You are standing on X=" + absX + " Y=" + absY);
